name: Flower Garden (itch) (Azylmarillion)
description:
Flower Garden was produced in 48h during the Game Pratic '2019. The goal is to offer a soothing experience.

You play as Clemence Isaure a legendary seedling character who is the allegory of Flora the Roman goddess, she has created the Toulouse's floral games .

You arrive in a place where all vegetation is dead and you will bring back this vegetation by walking through this landscape.
